name: Escape the Tank (Justin P Barnett - VR Dev)
name_original: Escape the Tank (Justin P Barnett - VR Dev)
description:
I had the idea for this game after re-reading Ready Player One. In the book the main character has to play a game that is essentially a movie that has been turned into a game. He plays one of the main characters of that movie and has to perform all the dialog and actions in the right order at the right time.

I thought of Finding Nemo as inspiration because one of the main premises is escaping the fish tank he's trapped in. In this game you'll walk through a few of the steps Nemo had to.

Directions:

Movement: Press both grip buttons at the same time to 'grip' the water and pull yourself through it. Perform a swimming motion by pulling by pressing the grip buttons and then releasing to move your hands forward again.

Interaction: Pick up rocks by putting your 'fin' close and pressing the grip button.

*Disclamers*

  1. I am in no way affiliated with the movie Finding Nemo or it's associated companies.
  2. This is NOT my best work. Hit a spot of really bad unmotivation the whole last day of the jam (https://itch.io/jam/vr-jan-jam), so not to proud of this piece.
